column3: Faculty of Bioscience and Technology for Food, Agriculture and Environment
column5: PRESENTATIONThe Master study programme in "Food Science and Technology" is aimed to students with a Bachelor degree
column7: The fees for foreign students are 300 euros plus fixed stamp duties and regional taxes (156 euros) per year in 4 installments.  The fees for student coming from developing countries are 150 euros plus fixed stamp duties and regional taxes per year in 3 installments.
